subitems.name: Ultramarine Linux
subitems.description: Ultramarine Linux is a Fedora-based Linux distribution designed to stay out of your way and be easy to use. All editions come with several tweaks preapplied to make initial setup and daily usage seamless.

subitems.name: Ultramarine Linux Flagship Edition
subitems.description: Our default and most popular variant. Choose Flagship if you'd like a familiar and stylish experience.

subitems.name: Ultramarine Linux KDE Edition
subitems.description: Our second most popular variant. Choose KDE if you'd like a simply customisable experience.

subitems.name: Ultramarine Linux GNOME Edition
subitems.description: Elegant and Modern. Choose GNOME if you'd like a simple, unique experience.

subitems.name: Ultramarine Linux Xfce Edition
subitems.description: Lightweight and Configurable. Choose Xfce if you'd like a lighter experience.

subitems.name: Ultramarine Linux Base
subitems.description: Ultramarine with No Desktop.

subitems.name: Bass Desktop Mode - Android 14 (RPi 4B, CM4, 400) - SD Card Only

subitems.name: Bass Restricted Mode - Android 14 (RPi 4B, CM4, 400) - SD Card Only
subitems.description: Minimal AOSP based Android OS. A Lockdown/Admin (UBoot boot modes) based build with the free version of Restricted Launcher (a Kiosk launcher), KernelSU, MicroG and FOSS app stores
